parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: StatusList
parameters.description: The states of the relationships between the management account and its members. The valid values of this parameter are the enumeration members of the RelationshipStatusEnum data type. If you do not specify this parameter, valid relationship states are queried by default.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.
